titleStmt.title: The city of Londons rejoinder to Mr. Attorney General's replication in the Quo warranto brought by him against their charter wherein they plead, that, I. By prescription they have a right, 1. To appoint, alter, and change rhc [sic] markets within the city from one place to another, 2. To regulate markets and
